programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: Ethan and Lena meet and fall in love, and together, they uncover dark secrets about their respective families, their history, and their town in this supernatural romance thriller.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York
programme.desc: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: Ex-soldier Joseph Smith comes home from war but has been left disturbed by his experiences. Despite his intentions to start a new life, he becomes caught up in the criminal underworld, where he plots revenge on his friend's killer.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous
programme.desc: Joe (Nicolas Cage) is a career assassin who is in Bangkok to handle a contract, when he finds himself unexpectedly training a young protégé and falling for a woman who has no knowledge of his true vocation.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into The Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Enter a universe where more than one wears the mask.

programme.title: Doa: Dead Or Alive
programme.desc: The plot revolves around four female fighters who begin as rivals, but subsequently find themselves teaming up against another force.

programme.title: Avengers Confidential: Black Widow & Punisher
programme.desc: The Punisher teams up with Black Widow on a high-stakes mission to stop Leviathan, a terrorist organization, from selling stolen S.H.I.E.L.D. technology to the highest bidder, saving the world and the Avengers.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Battle For The Heartfire
programme.desc: Drago, a dragon who shares his heart with the king of Brittania, must find an heir to the throne when the king passes. But the potential heirs use their inherited dragon strength and fire power against each other to vie for the throne.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a rich, spoiled playboy who has been happy to maintain a direction-less existence. When his father James Reid dies, Britt meets an impressive and resourceful company employee, Kato.

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: When retired CIA agent finds himself the target of a deadly assassin he reaches out to his old work friends in a bid to learn the truth while staying out of the mysterious enemy's clutches.

programme.title: Red 2
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Frank Moses and his team of hapless heroes return for another risky mission - this time tasked with finding a dangerous nuclear weapon. The team embark on a perilous journey to Europe pursued by deadly terrorists and government officials.

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: Ex-soldier Joseph Smith comes home from war but has been left disturbed by his experiences. Despite his intentions to start a new life, he becomes caught up in the criminal underworld, where he plots revenge on his friend's killer.

programme.title: Air Warriors S6 - Ac-130 Spectre
programme.desc: Follow the rise, fall, and rebirth of the AC-130 gunship, a four-prop behemoth that revolutionized American air support in the ’60s. See how a design weakness sidelined it during Operation Desert Storm in the ’90s and triggered a successful redesign.

programme.title: Air Warriors S6 - F6f Hellcat
programme.desc: Get the story behind the development of the Grumman F6F Hellcat, the lithe, agile fighter plane that helped America turn the tide in the Pacific during World War II. See how it made a historic impact in key battles against Japan’s powerful navy.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: Autumn is on hold as summer continues, with unexpectedly balmy conditions throwing a life line to the roe deer as they prepare for the winter ahead. For other animals, mating season has arrived, making for a testosterone-fuelled time at Ravenscar Beach.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: Despite its delayed arrival, for the Grey Seals at Ravenscar Beach winter means it is time to give birth. The newborn pups are now on the fast track to adulthood, with just three weeks to gain as much weight as possible before their mothers move on.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: The end of winter heralds one of the world's greatest feeding frenzies as large ocean predators target the millions of fish who have found refuge in the Gulf of Alaska.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild - Spring
programme.desc: With the arrival of spring, days grow longer and temperatures rise. However, spring in Alaska is short. Animals have just two months to find food and start a family, while avoiding predators.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: Summer has arrived in Alaska.This sets the scene for one of the world's greatest migrations of the Alaskan salmon run.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: Humpback whales return to Alaska's rich feeding grounds and salmon return to spawn in the rivers. The returning salmon however have to negotiate a path past hungry brown bears.

programme.title: Air Warriors S6 - F-4 Phantom
programme.desc: Known by some as the Double Ugly or the MiG Killer, the F-4 Phantom is a lean, mean war machine. See how this supersonic jet was built for the Cold War and provided four decades of service as one of America’s most well-known fighter planes.

programme.title: Bornean Elephants
programme.desc: The documentary takes the perspective of Bornean elephants in Sabah as they traverse through the landscape and show how these gentle giants can coexist with humans amidst different challenges faced.

programme.title: Into The Puma Triangle
programme.desc: Casey Anderson, a Montana native wildlife expert works with wildlife filmmaker René Araneda to capture the wild pumas of Torres del Paine National Park in Chilean Patagonia. Together, they have filmed things seen nowhere else in the world that will unlock the mystery of the puma’s true nature.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Spring
programme.desc: Spring is late this year, and when it finally arrives, the race is on to find a mate and start a family; black bears and beavers in the west, wood frogs in the south and 20,000 gannets in the east all have one thing on their minds.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Above And Beyond Loyal
programme.desc: Amy Rouse and her Border Collie Mist trains for the English National Sheepdog Trials. Quebec's MIRA foundation provides assistance dogs for children with autism. Buddy, a hero dog, guides an Alaskan State Trooper to his owner's workshop.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - The Mystery Of Healing Part 2
programme.desc: Dogs and diabetes - how does it work? Whizz provides therapeutic benefits to children with special needs. Pups in Prison are trained by inmates over a period of 16 months.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Instinct; The Sixth Sense Part 1
programme.desc: A Staffordshire Bull Terrier Diesel who is able to locate cheetah faecal droppings. Ozzie is one of only three dogs in the world who is trained to detect poisonous Cane Toads.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Critical Sight
programme.desc: How are dogs trained to guide the blind and visually impaired? Border Collies at Johannesburg International Airport are used to chase birds and in Japan, new puppies are born and bred to become guide dogs in future.

programme.desc: Get the story behind the development of the Grumman F6F Hellcat, the lithe, agile fighter plane that helped America turn the tide in the Pacific during World War II. See how it made a historic impact in key battles against Japan’s powerful navy.

programme.title: Air Warriors S6 - F-4 Phantom
programme.desc: Known by some as the Double Ugly or the MiG Killer, the F-4 Phantom is a lean, mean war machine. See how this supersonic jet was built for the Cold War and provided four decades of service as one of America’s most well-known fighter planes.

programme.title: Bornean Elephants
programme.desc: The documentary takes the perspective of Bornean elephants in Sabah as they traverse through the landscape and show how these gentle giants can coexist with humans amidst different challenges faced.

programme.title: Into The Puma Triangle
programme.desc: Casey Anderson, a Montana native wildlife expert works with wildlife filmmaker René Araneda to capture the wild pumas of Torres del Paine National Park in Chilean Patagonia. programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Spring
programme.desc: Spring is late this year, and when it finally arrives, the race is on to find a mate and start a family; black bears and beavers in the west, wood frogs in the south and 20,000 gannets in the east all have one thing on their minds.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Above And Beyond Loyal
programme.desc: Amy Rouse and her Border Collie Mist trains for the English National Sheepdog Trials. Quebec's MIRA foundation provides assistance dogs for children with autism. Buddy, a hero dog, guides an Alaskan State Trooper to his owner's workshop.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - The Mystery Of Healing Part 2
programme.desc: Dogs and diabetes - how does it work? Whizz provides therapeutic benefits to children with special needs. Pups in Prison are trained by inmates over a period of 16 months.

programme.title: Air Warriors S6 - F-4 Phantom
programme.desc: Known by some as the Double Ugly or the MiG Killer, the F-4 Phantom is a lean, mean war machine. See how this supersonic jet was built for the Cold War and provided four decades of service as one of America’s most well-known fighter planes.

programme.title: Air Warriors S6 - F-22 Raptor
programme.desc: Delve into the archives and learn the history of the undetectable F-22 Raptor, the premier stealth fighter plane of the U.S. Air Force. Hear former pilots share rare inside accounts of the sneaky powers of this aircraft and its predecessors.

programme.title: Tom Cruise: Lights Camera Action
programme.desc: Having just turned 60, Tom Cruise is still one of the leading names in Hollywood. A prolific actor with a career spanning over 40 years, he is continually building a giant legacy within the film industry.

programme.title: The Rock: Moving Mountains
programme.desc: Whether it’s the money or the muscles, you don’t mess with The Rock! Wrestling star turned Hollywood megastar carved himself a path to becoming king of the entertainment industry and brings his one of a kind charisma, charm and signature smile to everything he touches.

programme.title: Roger Federer: A Champion's Journey
programme.desc: Wimbledon Stadium’s Honour Board is full of illustrious names. And in 1998, another emerged. Roger Federer. His journey to the top of the men’s game is the one of a true champion, in every sense of the word.

programme.title: Novak Djokovic: Refuse To Lose
programme.desc: Born in war-torn Belgrade, Serbia, Novak Djokovic developed his skills in some of the harshest conditions imaginable. Despite this, he rose to the top of the professional tennis rankings, becoming a national icon and a symbol of unity for the Siberian people.

programme.title: Lewis Hamilton
programme.desc: As the only black Formula One driver in history, Lewis' journey to becoming the most decorated Formula One driver in history, is one of dreams, courage, and determination. Follow the defiant story of Formula One’s greatest ever asset, Lewis Hamilton.

programme.title: Lionel Messi
programme.desc: Follow the journey of the Argentine prodigy Lionel Messi and witness how he became the greatest player in the world.

programme.title: Blackbird
programme.desc: Sean, a rebellious teenager, is falsely accused of planning a school massacre. He must survive a harrowing conflict with a prison gang leader while he attempts to prove his innocence to the community and those close to him.

programme.title: Aurora (2019)
programme.desc: Aurora, a commitment-phobic party animal, meets Iranian Darian one night at a hot-dog stand in Lapland. Darian is running from death and Aurora is running from love. They need each other to finally stop running.

programme.title: 7 Hours To Win Your Heart
programme.desc: When Giulio’s fiancée cheats on him right before their wedding, the newly singled Giulio decides to attend classes to win back his fiancée taught by Valeria, a beautiful and determined relationship coach disillusioned with love.

programme.title: Looking For Jacques
programme.desc: Based on a book and an original TV series from the 80s, Carina is a journalist digging into the disappearance of Jacques, a successful author. She is desperate for a juicy story to land a great job but the more she finds out, the less she wants to share.

programme.title: A Summer In Antwerp
programme.desc: Fashion designer Cara and her grandmother are reuniting with her childhood friend Judith who was forced to flee from Nazi Germany. But when they arrive at Antwerp to see her, it is not Judith who answers the door, but a young man named Mathis.

programme.title: Kidz
programme.desc: Sara and Nicola are married and in love. Their lives seem to be perfect: they have an angelic six-year-old daughter, thriving careers and a stable marriage. The birth of their second child, which disrupts the family balance, leads to tragicomic scenarios.

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump
programme.desc: When Grump's wife dies, he sees no reason to live on. But just as his coffin is finished, Grump gets a new spark and a major secret! His teenage granddaughter is in trouble and needs help and wisdom from her grandfather, and the warmth of his fireplace.

programme.title: Adventures In The Land Of Asha
programme.desc: After 9-year-old Jules is banned from school because of his rare skin disease, his greatest wish is to be cured. He meets a mysterious new friend, Asha, after his dog runs away into the forest. Together, they go on an adventure to find a cure for him.

programme.title: Unsinkable
programme.desc: In 1981, the newly built and unsinkable rescue boat RF2 sinks on an early mission, killing nine. Henrik, son of the captain blamed for the disaster, must investigate amidst resistance from fishermen fearing job losses and authorities dreading scandal.

programme.title: Jeanny: The Fifth Girl
programme.desc: In a picturesque tiny town near Vienna, young girls have been vanishing without a trace for years. Jeanny has just fallen in love with a mysterious man. But when she notices signs of a dark side in him, she becomes suspicious. Will she be the next victim?

programme.title: Sofia
programme.desc: In Morocco, sex outside marriage is punishable by up to 12 months in prison. But when unmarried Sofia gives birth, her family’s biggest fear is not her going to jail, it’s preserving their honour.

programme.title: Parents vs Influencers
programme.desc: Philosophy professor Paolo is a single father who finds himself losing his teenage daughter to her social media addiction. His efforts to dissuade her from using social media ironically results in Paolo becoming a social media influencer himself.

programme.title: Built To Scale
programme.desc: Lou, company misfit, builds a miniature model of her office and discovers she has the magical ability to control the real world. As she attempts to use it, she discovers that she is inadvertently reproducing the very toxicity she is trying to escape.

programme.title: Murders In Hossegor
programme.desc: Local VIP Juliette is found killed in the same way as a falsely accused shepherdess who died 600 years ago. The police struggle to find a link between the modern murder and an archaic legend – but the devil is in the details of Juliette’s personal life.
